page.title: 07** SARAH'S DAY AT SCHOOL **
page.content: {A School Day In The Life Of Sarah.} About 8 a.m. I woke up and it was raining and very dull. My Mum shouted, "Get up!" I wanted to stay in bed but I had to get up. I had my breakfast and got ready for school. Then my sister took me to school. I got to school and I did some sums and I got them all right.Then I did some English and History. At half past ten it was playtime. We went out and played skipping and when we came in we got ready to play rounders. My team won. When I had finished my work I went down to eat my dinner and pudding. Then we came in and said our prayers. We put our chairs up and we went in to the hall and sang songs for twenty minutes. Then we went back into our classrooms and then we went home. {By Sarah Walsh. Aged 9. {St. Gregory's Primary School.
